channel.title: Record a chord from midi input
channel.description:
Has anyone designed a patch that records a polyphonic chord to a table? I just need a table with about 6 note numbers corresponding to six notes held on a midi keyboard.
I am having trouble writing to a table within a polyphonic sub-patch. I thought I would use polyindex to specify the table position, then simply write the note value to that index, but the patch will not load.
or, if anyone is using sss/Math/8xSortMidiNotes to process polyphonic input, how are you extracting 8 separate note numbers and gates from keyboard input?
Thank you kindly
